greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Exponent of 2 in phi(n) where phi(n) = A000010(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: For n = 513 = 27*19, phi(513) = 4*81 so exponent of 2 is 2, thus a(513) = 2.
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jan 18 2000
ext: Data section extended to 120 terms by _Antti Karttunen_, May 26 2017
